title: Crayfish, griddled corn and avocado salad with buttermilk dressing

ingredients.item: 1 pack essential Waitrose Corn on the Cob
2 Waitrose 1 Perfectly Ripe Large Avocados, sliced

instructions.step: Preheat a griddle pan over a high heat, or prepare a barbecue so the coals are at a medium-high heat. Rub the corn cobs with the oil, season and grill, turning regularly, for 8-12 minutes until softened and charred. Stand each cob upright on a chopping board and use a sharp knife to slice down the length of the cobs to remove the kernels in clusters.

Whisk together the buttermilk, Dijonnaise or mayonnaise and vinegar in a bowl; season and stir in the chives. Trim the base of the iceberg lettuce, halve then cut into wedges. Arrange on a platter with the corn kernels, avocado and crayfish. Spoon over the dressing and scatter with the chopped salad onions and a pinch of cayenne pepper.
